description: Aryl hydrocarbon receptor activation by FICZ modulates intestinal epithelial barrier function.
FICZ induced AhR activation inhibits the effects of DSS on TJ protein expression.
AhR activation prevents TNF-α/IFN-γ-induced decrease in TER and morphological disruption.
AhR activation prevents TNF-α/IFN-γ-induced morphological disruption of TJs.
FICZ induced AhR activation inhibits the increase in MLC phosphorylation.
FICZ induced AhR activation inhibits TNF-α/IFN-γ-induced increase in MLCK expression.

target: Nuclear Factor Kappa B Subunit P65 (NF-κB p65)
description: FICZ suppresses NF-κB p65 signaling pathway involved in colitis.
